participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Motivated and energetic, Emily thrives on helping others reach their fitness goals. She has a positive outlook on life and is always looking for ways to improve herself and those around her.
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i'm a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake enjoys the thrill of outdoor activities while appreciating the simple pleasures in life, like a good cup of coffee. He's friendly and approachable, making friends easily.
participant_2.background: i'm a huge coffee lover. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i do not drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.
